Detailed Description

Message is the object for all data received form the network.

The monitor create an instance of Message each time it receive smthg

Member Function Documentation

def xPLAPI::Message::__init__ (   self,
  mess = None 
)

Create Message instance from a message string and check if the structure is correct.

Raise exception if it is not The message can be None (to allow building a message)

Parameters:
mess : the message as a unique string, as it is send on the network

def xPLAPI::Message::set_data_order (   self,
  order 
)

As schema define parameter order, and since this class isn't specific enough to determine order, you have to set the order to ensure a good message.

If you do not, the order of parameter in each part may not conform to schema If you set order, be sure to list all the keys !

def xPLAPI::Message::set_conf_order (   self,
  order 
)

As schema define parameter order, and since this class isn't specific enough to determine order, you have to set the order to ensure a good message.

If you do not, the order of parameter in each part may not conform to schema If you set order, be sure to list all the keys !
